This script is used for countting how many of the plots show shift from one dominance to the other or to the mixed.

Load the dataset

```{R}

dfwithinfo.transition <- read.csv('C:\\Users\\haozh\\Desktop\\LL\\GFBI_data\\dswithinfo_dominance_transition_20210523.csv')

head(dfwithinfo.transition)

```

```{R}

for(i in 1:nrow(dfwithinfo.transition)){
  subds <- dfwithinfo.transition[i, c(7,8)]
  #print(duplicated(subds))
  if(subds[1,1] == subds[1,2]){
    dfwithinfo.transition[i,'transition'] <- 0
  }
  else{
    dfwithinfo.transition[i, 'transition'] <- 1
  }
  
  if(i%%100 == 0){
    print(i)
  }
}



```

```{R}
head(dfwithinfo.transition)

```

```{R}
mean(dfwithinfo.transition$transition)
sum(dfwithinfo.transition$transition)

```
